title: Giving Back the Flower Flower Contrasts

content.question: In the context of the poem as a whole, the contrast of “a little scarlet bud, that was dying of frost” (line 4) in the first stanza with the “sweetness” (line 21) of the flower in the last stanza suggests that the speaker has

choices.label: come to terms with her loss

content.answer: come to terms with her loss

skill.text: Skill 3.D: Explain the function of contrasts within a text.
